cause.description:
We're more than just angry mothers:
We're dads and daughters, sons and uncles, friends and neighbors, and mothers. We come from all walks of life. We are many colors with one voice.
1. High-visibility law enforcement, including sobriety checkpoints
2. Ignition interlocks for all convicted drunk drivers
3. Advanced vehicle technologies to prevent drunk driving
4. www.madd.org
cause.mission: MADD's mission is to stop drunk driving, support the victims of this violent crime and prevent underage drinking.
cause.name: Mothers Against Drunk Driving
